metadata.title: CVE-2016-9829 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the parseSWF_DEFINEFONT function in parser.cin the listswf tool in libming 0.4.7 allows remote attackers to haveunspecified impact via a crafted SWF file.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
